text: AdenocarcinomaFrom adeno-, "gland" and karkin(o)-, "cancerous" and -oma, "tumor". (; plural adenocarcinomas or adenocarcinomata ) (AC) is a type of cancerous tumor that can happen in several parts of the body. It mainly happens in the glandular area. ==References== Category:Medicine Category:Cancer C
title: Adenocarcinoma
